text: kya tu ne ose nahi dekha jo saltanath pa kar Ibraheem (alaihissalaam) se us ke rab ke baare mein jhagad raha tha, jab Ibraheem (alaihissalaam) ne kaha ke mera rab to wo hai jo jilaata72 hai aur maarta hai, wo kehne laga main bhi jilaata aur maarta hoon, Ibraheem (alaihissalaam) ne kaha Allah suraj ko mashriq ki taraf se le aata hai, tu ose maghrib ki jaanib se le aa, ab to wo kaafir bhoon-chuka reh gaya, aur Allah taâ€™ala zaalimo ko hidaayath nahi deta
